This is one of the best Fps games ever made, anyone can play this masterpiece, even on the weakest computer you can play.  It is not as popular as it used to be, but there are still people who play this game today.  If you have 1 euro or any value on steam, and wait for summer sale or winter sale.  Buy this game.  10/10.
